content: Begin Layer 4 (Storage) implementation - ProcessMemoryStore and KnowledgeGraph classes. Follow roadmap (BOOTSTRAP-COMPLETE.md Weeks 5-6). Implement JSONL append operations, entry querying/filtering, JIT (Just-In-Time) reading with 70% token savings. Create KnowledgeGraph with graph construction from JSONL, relationship traversal, and semantic search. Target >90% test coverage. All quality gates must pass before completion.

integration_requirements: Entry querying and filtering by category, tags, keywords
